name: Santa: The Gift Thrower
description:
Santa Clause crashed his sleight and reindeer. He fell on a small town called broown neighborhood. Luckily he was able to get his christmas tree gun that shoots 3 types of gifts so he decided to make the town happy before leaving in 3 minutes

CONTROLS

A, W, S, D FOR MOVEMENTS
1, 2, 3 FOR CHANGING THE GIFT COLOR
MOUSE AND LEFT CLICK FOR AIMING AND THROW


MORE INFO

NPC DROPS POWERUPS 50% OF THE TIME
YOU CAN ENTER BUILDINGS
CHRISTMAS TREE IS YOUR BESTFRIEND
